7:
n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort()
    a.reverse()
    x = 1
    for i in range(n):
        if a[i] < x:
            break
        x += 1
    print(x)
    p = 1
    q = x
    for i in range(x):
        print(q, end=' ')
        for j in range(p):
            print(a[i], end=' ')
        print()
        q -= 1
9:
R, C = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    letters = []
    for i in range(R):
        letters.append(input())
    letters = [list(x) for x in letters]
    letters = [list(x) for x in zip(*letters)]
    count = 0
    for i in range(C):
        if len(set(letters[i])) == 1:
            count += 1
    print(count)
10:
N = int(input())
    acc = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    acc.sort()
    acc = acc[::-1]
    count = 0
    for i in range(N):
        if acc[i] == i+1:
            count += 1
    print(count)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    code()
11:
n = int(input())
    acc = [int(input()) for i in range(n)]
    acc.sort()
    acc = acc[::-1]
    m = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if acc[i] == acc[i+1]:
            m += 1
    print(m)
12:
n, k = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    v = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    v.sort()
    v = v[::-1]
    min_time = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if i % k == 0:
            min_time += 1
        min_time += v[i]
    print(min_time)
13:
n, k = map(int, input().split())
    v = list(map(int, input().split()))
    v.sort()
    v = v[::-1]
    i = 0
    while i < n:
        if v[i] == v[i+k-1]:
            i += k
        else:
            break
    print(i//k+1)
14:
n, k = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort()
    a.reverse()
    i = 0
    while i < n and a[i] >= k:
        i += 1
    print(n - i)
16:
a = int(input())
    a = str(a)
    a = list(a)
    a.sort()
    a = ''.join(a)
    a = int(a)
    if a % 7 == 0:
        print(a)
    else:
        print(0)
